Title: Requires certain utilities to adopt the common equity ratio and rate of return on equity authorized by the public service commission
Summary: Requires electric corporations, gas corporations, steam corporations and water-works corporations to adopt the common equity ratio and rate of return on equity authorized by the public service commission unless such utility can successfully demonstrate that such authorized rates do not meet their capital and/or operating needs.
LawCode: Add ยง65-c, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to requiring certain utilities to adopt the common equity ratio and rate of return on equity authorized by the public service commission
